channel.title: Black Wax
channel.description: <p><span style="font-family:tahoma,verdana,arial,helvetica,bitstream vera sans,sans-serif; font-size:12px">Jazz and funk with jazz influence, and spacier stuff that has psychedelic, avant garde or science fiction influences.</span></p>

Kyle Eastwood - Soulful Times Nils Landgren Funk Unit - Impressions (Live) Maceo Parker - 2 B or Not 2 B Harry Connick Jr - How Do Y'all Know? Jon Cleary - Getcha GoGo Juice Rob Longstaff - Who's the Fairest? Jacky Orszaczky - Ready to Listen Alabama 3 - Woke Up This Morning John Lurie - Stink Prince - Stare Prince - South Madhouse - 6 1/2

item.title: Black Wax presented by Justin Ashworth
item.description: Tracklist: Black Wax presented by Justin Ashworth - Audio Herbie Hancock - Palm Grease (Album: Thrust) Meshell Ndegeocello - Luqman (Album: The Spirit Music Jamia: Dance of the Infidel) Bill Frisell - Jump Monk (Album: Hal Willner Presents: Weird Nightmare - Meditations On Mingus) Will Calhoun - Whew (Album: Celebrating Elvin Jones) Dylan Howe - All Saints (Album: Subterranean - New Designs on Bowie's Berlin) Medeski, Martin & Wood & Nels Cline - Jade (Album: Woodstock Sessions Vol. 2) Vernon Reid - You Say He's Just A Psychic Friend (Album: Mistaken Identity) Twelve Tone Diamonds - Rhombus Room (Album: Unofficial Winner) Medeski Martin & Wood - Agmatia (Album: Zaebos: Book of Angels, Vol. 11) Bill Frisell & Chuck D - Gunslinging Bird (Album: Hal Willner Presents: Weird Nightmare - Meditations On Mingus) Brad Mehldau & Mark Guiliana - Taming The Dragon (Album: Mehliana: Taming The Dragon) Yuka Honda - Hydrosphere (Album: Heart Chamber Phantoms) Dave Douglas - Celine (Album: Dark Territory) Trio Of Doom - Para Oriente [Live] (Album: Trio Of Doom) Adam Simmons Quartet - Ripsnorter (Album: Metamorphosis)
